PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Start as Scion: Muling Character for Onslaught
Look for B-B-B Wand B-B-G Wand Movement Speed from Tarkleigh B-B Links Anywhere (Gloves, Helmet are best)
Witch is our Main Character
Lvl 1-4 Stormblast Mines Freezing Pulse + Onslaught
Lvl 4-8 Stormblast Mines Orb of Storms Frostblink + Arcane Surge Frost Bomb + Onslaught
Lvl 8 Grab Added Lightning Damage
Stormblast Mines + Orb of Storms + Added Lightning Damage Frostblink + Arcane Surge Frost Bomb + Onslaught
Lvl 10 Buy a Jade Amulet + Smoke Mine Pick Up Flame Dash
Stormblast Mines + Orb of Storms + Added Lightning Damage Flame Dash + Arcane Surge Frost Bomb + Onslaught Smoke Mine
After Merveil Grab Creeping Forst and Lvl in Offhand
After Fidelitas Grab Herald of Ice + Herald of Thunder or Skitterbots Buy Cold Snap and Level in Offhand
Help Alira
After Weaver
Grab Controlled Destruction Buy Controlled Destruction (another one) Buy Elemental Focus (x2)
After Crematorium Grab Frostbite (since we will swap to cold SOON) Buy Spellslinger (x2) and put in Offhand
After General Gravicious Grab Vortex
THIS IS WHEN WE SWAP TO SPELLSLINGER
DROP HERALDS + SKITTERBOTS
Spellslinger + Cold Snap + Elemental Focus Spellslinger + Creeping Frost + Controlled Destruction SELF-CAST Vortex + Elemental Focus + Controlled Destruction + Hypothermia (4th link after Library) Flame Dash + Arcane Surge Smoke Mine Frosbite (self cast) Frostbomb (self cast) Frenzy (This is what casts your Spells outside of Vortex)
You will use this Setup until Act 5 where you grab the FROZEN TRAIL Jewel and Socket it in your Tree on the LEFT SIDE next to DIVINE JUDGEMENT
When you get Frozen Trail
Spellslinger + Cold Snap Spellslinger + Creeping Frost + Bonechill Spellslinger + Frostbolt + Faster Projectiles Vortex + Elemental Focus + Controlled Destruction + Hypothermia Flame Dash + Arcane Surge Smoke Mine Frostbite (self cast) Frostbomb (self cast) Frenzy
USE THE SETUP ABOVE UNTIL YOU HAVE ENOUGH MANA UNRESERVED TO USE THE FOLLOWING LINKS
THE SETUP BELOW IS YOUR SETUP UNTIL YOU SWAP TO LOWLIFE
Spellslinger + Cold Snap + Elemental Focus + Bonechill Spellslinger + Frostbolt + Creeping Frost + Faster Projectiles Vortex + Elemental Focus + Efficacy + Controlled Destruction + Swift Affliction (5th link) + Hypothermia (6th link) Flame Dash + Smoke Mine + Arcane Surge + Second Wind Frost Bomb + Curse On Hit + Frostbite Frenzy Cast when Damage Taken + Steelskin Vaal RF (if you have leftover socket for single target)
THIS IS THE SETUP FOR LOWLIFE
Rime Gaze or Crown of the Inward Eye Spellslinger + Cold Snap + Elemental Focus + Bonechill
Boots/Gloves Spellslinger + Frostbolt + Creeping Frost + Faster Projectiles
Shavronnes Wrappings Vortex + Elemental Focus + Efficacy + Controlled Destruction + Swift Affliction (5th link) + Hypothermia (6th link)
Boots/Gloves Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Frenzy + Vaal RF
Weapon Frostbomb (Or Phantasmal Wave of Conviction) + Curse on Hit + Frostbite / Elemental Weakness (if you have Frostbite On Hit Ring) -> This is best in a Trigget socketed Wand
Shield Malevolence + Hated + Zealotry (Or Discipline if you don't have an Unset Ring)
Unset Ring Discipline
THIS BUILD REQUIRES A "CURSE ON HIT" RING TO DUAL CURSE. GET A FROSTBITE ON HIT FROM DELVE / REDEEMER INFLUENCE IF YOU DO NOT HAVE 2nd CURSE GO "VILE BASTION" as your LAST Ascendency
BEST ENCHANT FOR THIS BUILD: "Skills Supported by Spellslinger have 15% Mana Reserved" (Necessary to fit Discipline with Self-Control on a Cluster Jewel) Other viable enchants: Spellslinger CDR, Vortex Dmg, anything else.
CLUSTER JEWELS ARE NOT NECESSARY UNTIL YOU SWAP TO LOWLIFE - CHECK "ITEMS" SECTION
YOU CAN USE CINDERSWALLOW ON THIS BUILD TO INCREASE YOUR DOT DAMAGE BY ~10% THIS REQUIRES A SOURCE OF FIRE DAMAGE THAT CAN CRIT CHEAPEST WAY TO ACHIEVE THIS IS A "Mantra of Flames" or a regular "Abyss Jewel" with "Fire Damage to Spells" or "Fire Damage to Spells while Holding a Shield"
